topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558ee7776368723d96001552#post_558ee7776368723d96001552
Those are all possibilities, but I'm not sure how likely they are to happen on a large scale. Most such institutions are more focused on money than on anything else and if they are inclined to be complete fucking asshole bigots then I doubt they'd have been all stealthy about it up till now.

Besides that, no one aside from complete fucking asshole bigots is going to court the controversy of winding up on the nightly news as the hotel or banking equivalent of an anti gay bakery and get slaughtered in the court of public opinion.

My advice to anyone who does get caught in this sort of shitstorm though? Make as a big a fucking stink out of it as you can. Tell literally everyone you can about how the people fucking you over are doing so because they're bigoted fucks. The ultimate goal is to force them to go on the defensive and watch the furious fucking back pedaling.

"@MoogSourceVermona":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558edf66636872394a0002d4#post_558edf66636872394a0002d4
[bq="MoogSourceVermona"]"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558edc18636872477a00029a#post_558edc18636872477a00029a
its a decent start into the world of music. its a decent Ambient track that i could see it being used in some sci-fi fantasy type of film where the protagonist is just walking through an enchanted forest of some sorts. i can hear quite well that youre using softsynths to make this, im gonna guess FM8 and/or Absynth were used for this.

overall its a good starting place but nothing more than that as of now[/bq]

It was made in ableton live and everything was hand made (like there are no audio loops) ummm I can do better but bleh i didnt feel like hooking up my portable grand and stuff
